languages.text: {n}Попытка вывернуться венчается невыносимой болью в спине. Сил хватает только на то, чтобы дернуться вверх и ощутить, как хрустит внутри каркас-позвоночник.{/n}

{n}Your attempt at twisting your body around only ends in a racking pain shooting through your back. The most you can achieve is a lurch upward accompanied by a piercing crunch somewhere in the spine.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Попытка вывернуться венчается невыносимой болью в спине. Сил хватает только на то, чтобы дернуться вверх и ощутить, как хрустит внутри каркас-позвоночник.{/n}

{n}Your attempt at twisting your body around only ends in a racking pain shooting through your back. The most you can achieve is a lurch upward accompanied by a piercing crunch somewhere in the spine.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你试图转动身体，但一阵剧烈的刺痛从背后传来。你努力伸展着肌肉，试图略微抬起身体，却便听到脊柱某处传来了刺耳的咯吱声。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your attempt at twisting your body around only ends in a racking pain shooting through your back. The most you can achieve is a lurch upward accompanied by a piercing crunch somewhere in the spine.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你试图转动身体，但一阵剧烈的刺痛从背后传来。你努力伸展着肌肉，试图略微抬起身体，却便听到脊柱某处传来了刺耳的咯吱声。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Intentas moverte y lo único que consigues es un dolor lacerante que te recorre la espalda. Te incorporas más por inercia que por otra cosa, y notas un sonoro crujido en algún lugar de tu espina dorsal.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your attempt at twisting your body around only ends in a racking pain shooting through your back. The most you can achieve is a lurch upward accompanied by a piercing crunch somewhere in the spine.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Intentas moverte y lo único que consigues es un dolor lacerante que te recorre la espalda. Te incorporas más por inercia que por otra cosa, y notas un sonoro crujido en algún lugar de tu espina dorsal.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vücudunu döndürme girişimin, sadece sırtına saplanan sarsıcı bir acıyla sonuçlanıyor. Başarabildiğin en fazla şey, omurganın bir yerlerinde keskin bir çıtırtıyla eşlik edilen yukarı doğru bir sendeleme hareketi yapmak oluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your attempt at twisting your body around only ends in a racking pain shooting through your back. The most you can achieve is a lurch upward accompanied by a piercing crunch somewhere in the spine.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vücudunu döndürme girişimin, sadece sırtına saplanan sarsıcı bir acıyla sonuçlanıyor. Başarabildiğin en fazla şey, omurganın bir yerlerinde keskin bir çıtırtıyla eşlik edilen yukarı doğru bir sendeleme hareketi yapmak oluyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}体をねじろうとする試みは、背中を貫くような激しい痛みをもたらすだけだ。あなたにできることは、脊椎のどこかを鋭くすりつぶすことによる上方向のよろめきである。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your attempt at twisting your body around only ends in a racking pain shooting through your back. The most you can achieve is a lurch upward accompanied by a piercing crunch somewhere in the spine.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}体をねじろうとする試みは、背中を貫くような激しい痛みをもたらすだけだ。あなたにできることは、脊椎のどこかを鋭くすりつぶすことによる上方向のよろめきである。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Votre tentative de contorsionner votre corps se solde par une douleur lancinante dans le dos. Vous parvenez tout juste à vous redresser avec un craquement atroce de votre colonne vertébrale.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your attempt at twisting your body around only ends in a racking pain shooting through your back. The most you can achieve is a lurch upward accompanied by a piercing crunch somewhere in the spine.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Votre tentative de contorsionner votre corps se solde par une douleur lancinante dans le dos. Vous parvenez tout juste à vous redresser avec un craquement atroce de votre colonne vertébrale.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Beim Versuch, deinen Körper zu drehen, schießt dir ein heftiger Schmerz in den Rücken. Du kannst dich mit einem bedrohlichen Knirschen deiner Wirbelsäule lediglich ein wenig aufrichten.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your attempt at twisting your body around only ends in a racking pain shooting through your back. The most you can achieve is a lurch upward accompanied by a piercing crunch somewhere in the spine.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Beim Versuch, deinen Körper zu drehen, schießt dir ein heftiger Schmerz in den Rücken. Du kannst dich mit einem bedrohlichen Knirschen deiner Wirbelsäule lediglich ein wenig aufrichten.{/n}
